dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile depicts bare areas in Kenya. Bare areas are naturally devoid of vegetation, such as those covered by rocks or rock fragments. This layer is a version of the original FAO Africover Multipurpose Land Cover Databases for Kenya (2000).This data was used in Map 1.3 in Nature's Benefits in Kenya: An Atlas of Ecosystems and Human Well-Being.
dc_publisher_s: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
dc_creator_sm: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
